org.contentmine.norma.image.ocr

Class CharBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.norma.image.ocr.CharBox

  • public class CharBox
extends java.lang.Object
    holds the output of GOCR combined with the underlying image. requires parentG to have children SVGRect (from GOCR), SVGText (with GOCR char) SVGImage (clipped to fit box) May be extended to HOCR output as well (?AbstractOCRCharBox)
    Author:
    pm286
